experiences.description: Monitored 50 client systems to ensure optimal functionality and prevent downtime. Managed help desk operations and created 10 error resolution guides to improve troubleshooting workflows. Fixed 50+ client system issues and provided technical support and troubleshooting system problems.

Mentored and supported a cohort of 7 students through weekly 1:1 check-ins, addressing project challenges and ensuring progress with course materials. Facilitated workshops, in-class activities, and icebreakers to foster an engaging and collaborative learning environment. Represented CodePath at Georgia State University events, increasing program visibility and driving student enrollment. Collaborated with CodePath staff and fellow Tech Fellows to improve the student experience through feedback loops and curriculum enhancements.
